trans-unit.source: Represents a set of query parameters that can be passed to a personalization provider using the various get and find methods.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un set di parametri di query che può essere passato a un provider di personalizzazioni utilizzando vari get e metodi.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: This class is used as a parameter value for various get and find methods of a personalization provider, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe viene utilizzata come valore di parametro per ottenere diversi e i metodi di un provider di personalizzazioni, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A> e</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default indexer allows generic access to the query parameters maintained by this object.
trans-unit.target: L'indicizzatore predefinito consente l'accesso generico per i parametri di query gestiti da questo oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The three properties that are explicitly exposed by this class, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>, are stored using query key values that are the same as the property names of this class.
trans-unit.target: Le tre proprietà esposte in modo esplicito da questa classe, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>, vengono archiviati utilizzando i valori di chiave di query che corrispondono ai nomi di proprietà di questa classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.Item%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.Item%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A instance of this class is used as a parameter value for various get and find methods of a personalization provider, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di questa classe viene utilizzata come valore di parametro per ottenere diversi e trovare metodi di un provider di personalizzazioni, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.GetCountOfState%2A> e</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider.FindState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the query parameter.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore del parametro della query.

trans-unit.source: This property is the default indexer for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery> class.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è l'indicizzatore predefinito per la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery>

trans-unit.source: It returns the value of the query parameter indicated by `queryKey`.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il valore del parametro di query indicato da `queryKey`.

trans-unit.source: You can use `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["UsernameToMatch"]`, `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["PathToMatch"]` and `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["UserInactiveSinceDate"]` to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["UsernameToMatch"]`, `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["PathToMatch"]` e `PersonalizationStateQuery.this["UserInactiveSinceDate"]` per impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A>proprietà, rispettivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UserInactiveSinceDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.PathToMatch%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateQuery.UsernameToMatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: When these three properties are set in the indexer, they are validated against the proper type.
trans-unit.target: Quando queste tre proprietà vengono impostate nell'indicizzatore, essi vengono convalidati rispetto al tipo corretto.

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if `queryKey` does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce `null` se `queryKey` non esiste.

trans-unit.source: A case-insensitive query string.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa di query tra maiuscole e minuscole.

trans-unit.source: The value should be one of the following: "PathToMatch", "UserInactiveSinceDate", or "UsernameToMatch".
trans-unit.target: Il valore deve essere uno dei seguenti: "PathToMatch", "UserInactiveSinceDate" o "UsernameToMatch".

trans-unit.source: The value of the query parameter indicated by the queryKey parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il valore del parametro di query indicato dal queryKey parametro.

trans-unit.source: queryKey is .
trans-unit.target: queryKeyis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to be used for a query.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il percorso da utilizzare per una query.

trans-unit.source: This property contains a path to match when executing queries.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà contiene un percorso per la corrispondenza quando l'esecuzione di query.

trans-unit.source: If PathToMatch contains wildcard characters, they are passed through to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Se PathToMatch contiene caratteri jolly, vengono passati all'archivio dati sottostante.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to `null`, indicating that a query should not filter based on path.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere impostata su `null`, indicare che una query deve essere filtrata in base al percorso.

trans-unit.source: If this property is non-`null`, its value is trimmed.
trans-unit.target: Se questa proprietà è non`null`, il relativo valore viene tagliato.

trans-unit.source: The path to be used for a query.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso da utilizzare per una query.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the last active date used in a query.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'ultima data attiva utilizzata in una query.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> property to filter against.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà indica il valore di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>proprietà da filtrare i dati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The exact comparison is to include records where the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> is less than or equal to the value of the UserInactiveSinceDate property.
trans-unit.target: Il confronto esatto è per includere i record in cui il valore di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>è minore o uguale al valore della proprietà UserInactiveSinceDate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UserPersonalizationStateInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>, indicating that a query should not filter based on the last activity date.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere impostata su <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>, che indica che una query deve essere filtrata in base all'ultima data di attività.</xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>

trans-unit.source: The last active date to be used in a query.
trans-unit.target: L'ultima data attiva da utilizzare in una query.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name in a query.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome utente in una query.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the user name to filter against when executing a query.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà rappresenta il nome utente per filtrare i dati quando si esegue una query.

trans-unit.source: If UsernameToMatch contains wildcard characters, they are passed through to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: Se UsernameToMatch contiene caratteri jolly, vengono passati all'archivio dati sottostante.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to `null`, indicating that a query should not filter based on the user name.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere impostata su `null`, che indica che una query deve essere filtrata in base al nome utente.

trans-unit.source: If this property is non-`null`, its value is trimmed.
trans-unit.target: Se questa proprietà è non`null`, il relativo valore viene tagliato.

trans-unit.source: The user name to be used in a query.
trans-unit.target: Il nome utente da utilizzare in una query.
